channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pile of leaves by council owned garage block needs collecting and disposing, 8th January
item.description:
There is a large pile of leaves at a Cheltenham Borough Council owned garage block (site 891) that needs to be collected. The garage block is situated behind the block of flats on Haywards Road (GL52 6RQ) and in the past the council has arranged for the leaves to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin has not been emptied for more than 2 weeks, 8th January
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned diversion sign, 8th January
item.description:
There's an diversion sign belonging to the Gloucestershire Highways depth. abandoned on the grass verge opposite 40 Greenway Lane, Charlton Kings. It's been there since work was carried out last year adding a drain to the road. Could you pick it up please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakhurst Rise, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction caused by wall/building problem, 8th January
item.description:
Customer states that a vehicle is parked at the end of the private road and is denying vehicular access to the lane via PROW, where access is required to fields and other properties for maintenance etc. The other end is bollarded off. Customer has an ongoing issue with the owners vehicle [plotted] and wants some advice regarding this issue.
Report on FixMyStreet
